text: aur jab hamaare bheje hue pharishte loot ke paas aae loot unake aane se gamageen hue aur un (kee mehamaanee) se dil tang hue (kyonki vah naujavaan khoobasoorat mardon kee saroot mein aae the) pharishton ne kaha aap khauph na karen aur kudhe nahee ham aapako aur aapake ladake baalon ko bacha legen magar aapakee beebee (kyonki vah peechhe rah jaane vaalo se hogee)
